ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] what you can cast on a mesmerised MOB
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Trepids ... Any of our spells that dont do damage can be cast on a mesmerized monster.... ie both of our weakening debuffs, slowing, MR debuff, mana seive
ygData.messageBody:
>----- Original Message -----
>From: ET1 TURNER <turnerda@...>
>To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Sent: Saturday, March 25, 2000 1:46 AM
>Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 260



> [ET1 TURNER]
> Ok.. I'm new to the list.. what all spells can you cast on a monster
> that is mez'd without it breaking? From what I just read, I take it
Trepids
> deeds is one.

Any of our spells that dont do damage can be cast on a mesmerized
monster.... ie both of our weakening debuffs, slowing, MR debuff, mana seive
(but why?), stuns, charms... am I missing some? Anything that doesnt hurt
it wont wake it up, this also includes other peoples debuffs.

Cogg - RZ
